title: Mastering the AI Image Generator
author: Ekobol AI Lab
image_caption: Turn amateur snapshots into studio-quality assets instantly.
p1: Ekobol's AI Image Generator isn't just a filter; it's a virtual photography studio. Using advanced diffusion models, it can place your product in any environment, fix lighting, and even expand image boundaries. This guide turns you from a beginner into a prompt engineer.
p2: Access the generator via Products → [Select Product] → AI Studio tab.
li1_text: Automatically detects and masks your product, removing the original background with 99% accuracy.
li2_text: Select from 50+ preset environments (e.g., 'Marble Countertop', 'Sunny Garden', 'Minimalist Podium').
li3_text: Remove unwanted elements (dust, scratches, logos) by painting over them.
p3: For custom backgrounds, talking to the AI correctly is key. Use this formula: [Subject] + [Surroundings] + [Lighting] + [Style].
li4_text: 'Perfume bottle on a wooden table, surrounded by pink rose petals, soft morning sunlight, cinematic depth of field, 8k resolution.'
p4: Be specific about textures, colors, and lighting conditions.
p5: Fine-tune the output to match marketplace requirements.
li6_text: Best for Instagram and Trendyol listings.
li7_text: Ideal for mobile apps and Stories.
li8_text: Perfect for website banners and hero images.
li9_text: Strict adherence to your original image's shape and lighting. Best for simple background swaps.
li10_text: More creative freedom. AI may add lighting effects or reflections that alter the mood.
p6: Tell the AI what NOT to generate to ensure clean results.
li11_text: Common negatives: 'blur, noise, distortion, watermark, text, low quality, ugly, darker, shadows'.
li12_text: Use the 'Strict Mode' toggle to automatically apply our curated list of negative prompts.
li13_text: Select 'Batch Mode' to generate 4 images at once.
li14_text: Variation 1: Lifestyle context (e.g., in a hand).
li15_text: Variation 2: Studio plain white (for Amazon compatibility).
p8: Train the AI to know your brand style.
li18_text: Upload a 'Style Reference' image (e.g., your brand mood board).
li19_text: Save successful prompts to your 'Prompt Library' for reuse.
li20_text: Lock specific color palettes (hex codes) to match your branding.
p9: Fix small details or expand the canvas.
li21_text: Mask an area (e.g., a hand holding the product) and prompt 'wooden stand' to replace the hand with a stand.
li22_text: Extend a cropped image to fit a wide banner without stretching the product.
li23_text: All generated images are royalty-free and owned by you.
li24_text: Download in JPG, PNG, or WebP formats.
li25_text: Maximum resolution: 4096 x 4096 px (with Upscaler enabled).
li26_text: Lower the 'Denoising Strength' or check clarity of original upload.
li27_text: Add 'clean, sharp focus' to your prompt and 'cluttered' to negative prompts.
li28_text: Ensure the lighting direction in your prompt matches the shadows in your original photo.
li29_text: ✅ Always start with a high-res, well-lit product photo.
li31_text: ✅ Generate 4-8 variations before choosing the winner.
li32_text: ✅ Don't be afraid to use the 'Magic Eraser' for post-processing.
